metadata.title: CVE-2021-38166 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In kernel/bpf/hashtab.c in the Linux kernel through 5.13.8, there is aninteger overflow and out-of-bounds write when many elements are placed in asingle bucket. NOTE: exploitation might be impractical without theCAP_SYS_ADMIN capability.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
